Package.Name: Paradox
Package.Author: Sebastien Warin
Package.Description: Paradox Security connector for Constellation and HomeAssistant

Setting.name: PortCom
Setting.description: The port to use (for example COM1 for Windows and /dev/ttyS0 or /dev/ttyUSB0 for Linux)

Setting.name: PortBaudRate
Setting.description: The serial port baud rate (57600 by defaut)

Setting.name: AntiBruteForceMaxTries
Setting.description: Block the Arming/Disarming method if wrong PIN code (0 to disable)

Setting.name: MessagesLogFilePath
Setting.description: File path to log each message sent/rcv with the PRT3 (leave empty to disable)

Setting.name: HomeAssistant
Setting.description: HomeAssistant MQTT Alarm Control Panel integration
